verses.name: Leviticus 25:5
verses.text: That which groweth of its own accord of thy harvest thou shalt not reap, neither gather the grapes of thy vine undressed: for it is a year of rest unto the land.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:6
verses.text: And the sabbath of the land shall be meat for you; for thee, and for thy servant, and for thy maid, and for thy hired servant, and for thy stranger that sojourneth with thee,

verses.name: Leviticus 25:7
verses.text: And for thy cattle, and for the beast that are in thy land, shall all the increase thereof be meat.
